text: This is by far the worst Batman movie ever made and will probably remain that way .

meta.plot: Following Val Kilmer's portrayal of the caped crusader inBatman Forever, the fourthBatmanfeature stars George Clooney under the pointy-eared cowl, with Chris O'Donnell returning as Robin the Boy Wonder. This time the dynamic duo is up against the nefarious Mr. Freeze (Arnold Schwarzenegger), who is bent on turning the world into an iceberg, and the slyly seductive but highly toxic Poison Ivy (Uma Thurman), who wants to eliminate all animal life and turn the Earth into a gigantic greenhouse. Alicia Silverstone lends a hand as Batgirl, and Elle McPherson plays the thankless role of Batman/Bruce Wayne's fiancée. A sensory assault of dazzling colors, senseless action, and lavish sets run amok, thisBatman & Robinoffers an overdose of eye candy, but it is strictly for devoted Bat-o-philes.--Jeff Shannon

text: If you took the cheesy , camp - filled ' 60 's Batman series and shot it with a huge budget , tons of effects and modern day equipment , Batman & Robin is what you 'd get ( and is what we got).Clearly this was the film that killed the Batman franchise .

meta.plot: Following Val Kilmer's portrayal of the caped crusader inBatman Forever, the fourthBatmanfeature stars George Clooney under the pointy-eared cowl, with Chris O'Donnell returning as Robin the Boy Wonder. This time the dynamic duo is up against the nefarious Mr. Freeze (Arnold Schwarzenegger), who is bent on turning the world into an iceberg, and the slyly seductive but highly toxic Poison Ivy (Uma Thurman), who wants to eliminate all animal life and turn the Earth into a gigantic greenhouse. Alicia Silverstone lends a hand as Batgirl, and Elle McPherson plays the thankless role of Batman/Bruce Wayne's fiancée. A sensory assault of dazzling colors, senseless action, and lavish sets run amok, thisBatman & Robinoffers an overdose of eye candy, but it is strictly for devoted Bat-o-philes.--Jeff Shannon

text: A.P. Fuchs

text: I enjoyed Batman Forever when it came out .
